    • Method Detail

      • enchantItem

        boolean enchantItem(Player player,
                    int slot)
        Enchants the item and subtracts the XP from the player.
        Parameters:
        player - The Player to subract XP from
        slot - The slot the player would've clicked. Range: 0-2
        Returns:
        false when player doesn't have enough XP.
        See Also:
        to see which slot has which level., For checking XP levels.

      • getEnchantLevels

        int[] getEnchantLevels()
        Gets the levels as displayed in the GUI. The upper slot has index 0.
        Returns:
        an int[3] containing the levels of the slots

      • getNumBookshelves

        int getNumBookshelves()
        Gets the number of Bookshelves that are validly in range of the Enchantment Table
        Returns:
        the number of nearby Bookshelves

      • getBookshelves

        Block[] getBookshelves()
        Gets the Bookshelves that are validly in range of the Enchantment Table
        Returns:
        an array of nearby Bookshelves
